    • 方法详细资料

      • inputLine

        public void inputLine()
        the input interface of the UI
        call the private function processCommand(String) to process the command.

      • processCommand

        private boolean processCommand(java.lang.String cmdCommand)
        to process the command, split it and judge what command it is.
        参数:
        cmdCommand - mean the whole line of command string.
        返回:
        ture mean continue input the command, flase mean quit the Agenda.

      • registerCommand

        private void registerCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the register command
        judge whether it's legal and call the register function of myAgenda if legal.
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.

      • addCommand

        private void addCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the add command
        judge whether it's legal.
        translate the string message into Date User and so on.
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.

      • queryCommand

        private void queryCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the query command
        judge whether it's legal.
        translate the string message into Date User for myAgenda.
        show the result of query
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.

      • deleteCommand

        private void deleteCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the delete command
        judge whether it's legal.
        translate the string message into User for myAgenda.
        show the if it delete successfully
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.

      • clearCommand

        private void clearCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the clear command
        judge whether it's legal.
        translate the string message into User for myAgenda.
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.

      • quitCommand

        private boolean quitCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the quit command
        judge whether it's legal.
        write back the data
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.
        返回:
        false mean quit success, true mean not

      • bacthCommand

        private boolean bacthCommand(java.lang.String[] cmdArray)
        to process the bacth command
        judge whether it's legal.
        read command from data
        run command one by one.
        参数:
        cmdArray - mean the array of string command.
        返回:
        false mean there is quit command in it, true mean not.
